name: filter
description: Comma separated values which are the name of the item fields and values for filtering the list of items to return.

schema.title: Filter the collection of items
schema.description: Used for filtering the items of the collection and only returns the subset which matches the filter criteria.

items.description:
key value pairs separated by '='; for nested properties the '.' character is used in the keys for indicating the scope hierarchy.
All the fields are joined by a logical AND.
Values must start with '=', '<' or '>' comparison operator, indicating 'equality', 'less than' and 'greater than', respectively.

simpleGt.summary: Filter items by amounts above a of certain quantity.

multiFilter.summary: Filter items by amount lower than certain quantity and type 'payment'.
